author: kfogel
msg: * www/svn_1.3_releasenotes.html: Revert r17942, thus restoring the
warning that says 1.3.0 is not actually released yet.

author: danderson
msg: Tag release 1.3.0 with svn_version.h matching tarball.

author: danderson
msg: Merge r16901 into the 1.3.x branch.  Edit svn_version.h before running autogen.sh --release to have correct version numbers in the SWIG binding code generated during the release process.

author: danderson
msg: Merge r17945 and r17946 into the 1.3.x branch.  Fix a utility perl script and set the release date for 1.3.0.
